code: import{dispatchHelper}from'../utils/utils';import{GET_GROUP_DETAILS,JOINED_GROUP,GET_GROUP_MEMBERS,GET_USER_GROUPS,GET_USERS_TO_INVITE,GET_MUTUAL_AND_NEWEST_MEMBERS,GET_USERS_TO_MAKE_ADMIN,TOGGLE_JOIN_GROUP,UPDATE_GROUP,REMOVE_MEMBER,LEFT_GROUP}from'./types';export var getGroupDetails=function getGroupDetails(grp_id){return dispatchHelper(GET_GROUP_DETAILS,'get-group-details',{grp_id:grp_id});};export var joinedGroup=function joinedGroup(group){return dispatchHelper(JOINED_GROUP,'joined-group',{group:group});};export var getGroupMembers=function getGroupMembers(grp_id){return dispatchHelper(GET_GROUP_MEMBERS,'get-group-members',{grp_id:grp_id});};export var getUserGroups=function getUserGroups(user){return dispatchHelper(GET_USER_GROUPS,'get-user-groups',{user:user});};export var getUsersToInvite=function getUsersToInvite(){return dispatchHelper(GET_USERS_TO_INVITE,'get-users-to-invite');};export var getMutualsAndNewestMembers=function getMutualsAndNewestMembers(grp_id){return dispatchHelper(GET_MUTUAL_AND_NEWEST_MEMBERS,'get-mutuals-and-newest-members',{grp_id:grp_id});};export var getUsersToMakeAdmin=function getUsersToMakeAdmin(grp_id){return dispatchHelper(GET_USERS_TO_MAKE_ADMIN,'get-users-to-make-admin',{grp_id:grp_id});};export var toggleJoinGroup=function toggleJoinGroup(j){return{type:TOGGLE_JOIN_GROUP,payload:j};};export var updateGroup=function updateGroup(gd){return{type:UPDATE_GROUP,payload:gd};};export var removeMember=function removeMember(member_id){return{type:REMOVE_MEMBER,payload:member_id};};export var leftGroup=function leftGroup(group_id){return{type:LEFT_GROUP,payload:group_id};};
